help: upload a dataset to seismic store
[localFile]  : path of the local file to upload
[legaltag]   : legal tag to be set to the dataset, if not provided, the suproject one will be used
| --idtoken=<token> pass the credential token to use, rather than generating a new one
download a dataset from seismic store
[localFile]  : path of the local file to download
(options)    | --idtoken=<token> pass the credential token to use, rather than generating a new one
copy a dataset inplace seismic store
(options)    | --idtoken=<token> pass the credential token to use, rather than generating a new one
name: cp
